insert into groupmember(GM_NUM, G_NUM, GM_INDEX, P_GRANT, M_ID, GM_STATUS) values('gm'||to_char(groupmem_num_seq.nextval), #{g_num}, GROUP_MEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{p_grant}, #{m_id}, #{gm_status})
